title: Born to Be Perfect
description: What can you do when those around you are as messed up as you are?Do you realize that we all have irrational personal quirks â€“ some barely noticeable, others more intrusive?How do you cope in a dysfunctional family, where the search for affection leads to rejection or, at best, indifference?Navin found a way in his own set of obsessive rules of cleanliness.This is a story about life and love amidst psychological issues like obsessions, anorexia, hoarding, and kleptomania.
author: Barbara Raghavan
